dct_alternative_sm: Nova totius Americae descriptio / auct. F. de Wit.
dct_description_sm: Top border has views of Cuzco, Mexico City, Olinda, Havanna, Santo Domingo and Cartagena.
Left and right borders have images of indigenous peoples.
Decorative cartouche with a native person riding an armadillo.
Lower left has image of Neptune and his queen riding sea horses.
dcat_keyword_sm: Cities and towns Western Hemisphere Views.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
